Package org.zaproxy.zap.extension.pscan

Class PluginPassiveScanner

java.lang.Object
org.zaproxy.zap.utils.Enableable
org.zaproxy.zap.extension.pscan.PluginPassiveScanner
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExampleAlertProvider, PassiveScanner, EnableableInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
RegexAutoTagScanner, ScriptsPassiveScanner, StatsPassiveScanner
public abstract class PluginPassiveScanner extends Enableable implements PassiveScanner, ExampleAlertProvider

      Deprecated.
      (2.7.0) Replaced by getAlertThreshold().
      Description copied from interface: PassiveScanner
      Gets the alert threshold of the scanner.

      Default implementation returns always Plugin.AlertThreshold.MEDIUM.

      Specified by:
      getLevel in interface PassiveScanner
      Returns:
      the alert threshold of the scanner.

    • getLevel

      @Deprecated public Plugin.AlertThreshold getLevel(boolean incDefault)
      Deprecated.
      (2.7.0) Replaced by getAlertThreshold(boolean).
      Gets the alert threshold of the scanner, possibly returning Plugin.AlertThreshold.DEFAULT.
      Parameters:
      incDefault - true if the value Plugin.AlertThreshold.DEFAULT can be returned, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      the alert threshold.

    • getAlertThreshold

      public Plugin.AlertThreshold getAlertThreshold()
      Gets the alert threshold of the scanner.

      If the alert threshold was set to DEFAULT it's returned the default value set.

      Returns:
      the alert threshold of the scanner.
      Since:
      2.7.0
      See Also:
      • setAlertThreshold(AlertThreshold)
      • getAlertThreshold(boolean)

    • getAlertThreshold

      public Plugin.AlertThreshold getAlertThreshold(boolean incDefault)
      Gets the alert threshold of the scanner, possibly returning Plugin.AlertThreshold.DEFAULT.
      Parameters:
      incDefault - true if the value Plugin.AlertThreshold.DEFAULT can be returned, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      the alert threshold.

    • newAlert

      protected PluginPassiveScanner.AlertBuilder newAlert()
      Returns a new alert builder.

      By default the alert builder sets the following fields of the alert:

      • Plugin ID - using getPluginId()
      • Name - using PassiveScanner.getName()
      • Message - the message being scanned
      • URI - from the alert message
      • Alert Tags - using getAlertTags()
      Returns:
      the alert builder.
      Since:
      2.9.0
